titles.title: A bill to provide for annual observances of certain legal public holidays on their traditional dates.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Redesignates the legal public holidays of the Birthday of Martin Luther King, Jr., as January 15, Washington's Birthday as February 22, Memorial Day as May 30, Columbus Day as October 12, and Veterans Day as November 11.
